channel.title: {317} Webclient Please {317}
channel.description:
I Need Someone To Make Me A Webclient Using This Client:
I Need The Webclient In HTML Form So I Can Add It Directly To A HTML Page. The Name I Want It To Be Is: RoidScape Also If You Can Add In The IP: 5.206.95.150 Download It Below:
http://uppit.com/av3f1thbt195/RoidScape_Client.rar http://www.megaupload.com/?d=09D1YBH0 http://www.mediafire.com/?vf7sdz5evwzabnj
I Have Scanned This And It Is Clean.
When You Finish Tell Me: 1. The HTML Text That I Can Copy Into My Server 2. What Reward Number You Want. 3. If You Want To Join My Forums/Server.
Rewards: [b]Pick Two![/b] 1. Server Moderator On My Server 2. Forum Moderator On My Forum 3. Respected Donator On My Forum (Also Items InGame) 4. A Highlighted Red Spot On The Credits On The Login Menu.
A Few Things You Should Know About My Server: 1. It Has A Tutorial Island 2. It Has The Original Login Menu 3. It Is Amazingly Awesome With All Teleports Working And Shops In Every Town. 4. Working Monsters (none glitch) ( clipping ) 5. Its Awesome.
One More Thing. This Is Not Advertising This Was All Necessary In Order For Anyone To Even Take A Second Look At This Page.
